text:
Hr. Jim Miles
2
October 1, 19#
In behalf of the DAVI~AERT committee, I wish to request that you take whatever steps
may be necessary to secure approval from your Board of Directors for NAEB participation
in the project.
Sincerely yours,
/s/ Jim
J. J. McPherson
Executive Secretary
JJMsecp
cct Mr. Kelsey Sweatt
Dr. James W. Brown
Dr. Paul Witt
Mr. John C. Crabbe
